title: Bug 16146setActiveEditor is not called when last editor closed
description: Build 20020515Kai reports that EditorActionBarContributor.setActiveEditor is not gettingcalled with null when the last editor of that type is closed.This used to happen, and they rely on it to properly unhook / dispose things.This may be the cause of some of the NPEs we've been seeing since a disposededitor may be referred to from these actions, and the actions are still hookedas listeners on the page.
